item.title: MIUI OS1.0.22.0.UNNCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K70 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K70 Ultra China

Codename: rothko

Version: OS1.0.22.0.UNNCNXM | 14.0

Size: 8.9 GB

MD5: 197c33cf17629cb1c7117e0c59e2343e

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: Camera previews and WeChat video calls
Optimization: Wi-Fi connectivity in specific network environments
Optimization: Bluetooth audio playback for car systems
Optimization: Multimedia system stability and gaming experience
Optimization: Color rendering and performance enhancements
[System]
New: 5G-A capabilities for better 5G connectivity (available when provided by your carrier)
Optimization: App launching algorithm speeds up app opening process

Download: Here
